Title: Relates to payments from the New York state medical indemnity fund for persons who sustained birth-related neurological injuries
Summary: Permits payments from the New York state medical indemnity fund for adult day programs, sheltered workshops and care coordination services for persons who sustained birth-related neurological injuries as the result of medical malpractice.
LawCode: Amd ยง2999-h, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to care for adult malpractice victims injured at birth
